name: Hotel Esperia Palace

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is beautiful, with stunning views down to the sea. We were given a triple room (at double price) with a balcony that went around the corner of the hotel so we could see the sea and the volcano (when the clouds cleared). The room was enormous with a huge well appointed bathroom - stand up shower plenty big enough for two, Duravit fittings, large fluffy towels, plenty of hot water.
reviews.title: Magnificent building - service not so much.

reviews.text: Now the bad news. The young lady at the front desk (who doubled as bartender two floors down) seemed overwhelmed. She was unable to make a Ferry reservation for us and was flummoxed by a question about where to go to get an Etna tour. There was wired internet in the room but wifi only in the lobby. Worst of all, our air conditioning stopped working and we got a runaround about it. "Oh, it's fixed now." "No it isn't" "Wait an hour" "We waited four hours - still a sauna in the room" "I'll send maintenance". The maintenance guy suggested we leave the outside door open. We did, still had two uncomfortable nights.
reviews.title: Beautiful modern hotel

aka: Hotel Esperia Palace Zafferana Etnea, Sicily, Italy
